1.content:
Rob wakes up to what seems to be in a testing tube. he try to break free but couldn't since the tube was glass. "Good to see your awake Project R ." a voice said. Rob was confused and looks around and saw the body of a alien with tentacle attached to its body. "w.....What am I?" He asked. The alien smirks and sets him free and grabs him, making rob squirm. "Your our creation. Your mission is to gather information on the genetic code of female organisms in any type of dimension we send you too." It said as it began to walk. You look around and notice that everything was silver and there were monitors with weird lights. "What if I fail?" He said. "then we don't go and bring you back" It said with a serious tone and places Rob in a room and left him there. "Which Dimension am I going first?" Rob asks. But before he could get an answer, the room started to shake and a bright light filled the room. Rob couldn't do anything and everything went white.

When he came to, he was in the........
1.title: The Begginning Of The Mission

12.content: He wakes up to what appears to be the sonic the hedgehog dimension. But where was he?
12.title: Sonic the hedgehog Dimension

1232.content: He looks around and noticed that he was in a room, meaning that he was in a house. Before he could figure which room he was in he heard a door start to open and he hid under the bed. He manages to see who it was that entered the room and it was:
1232.title: In someone's house

choices: Blaze uses a unknown power to find him.
12322.content: It was Blaze who entered the room.
12322.title: Blaze

123222.content: As he looks from under her bed, Blaze was looking around as if searching for something. When she was about to check under the bed. He had no choice but to:
123222.title: Blaze searches the place.

1232222.content: You decide to go inside Blaze's mouth quickly.
1232222.title: Go into her mouth

12322222.content:
Blaze backs away and tries to pull him out of her mouth, gagging as he felt him go through her throat. Her resistence was futile as she slowly began to lose conscienceness and fainted, allowing him to take control of her body.

He wakes up and got up, admiring his body.
12322222.title: Blaze resists?

12323.content: Who else entered the room?
12323.title: Others

123233.content: Did Vanilla entered the room?
123233.title: Someone else

15.content: Which dimensions did he ended up in?
15.title: Other

info.brief_description: Your an experiment created by aliens to gather information on female organisms.
info.description:
Your name is Rob(Also known as Project R). Your an experiment created by aliens to gather information on female organisms from any type of dimensions they send you to. Will you be able to complete your mission? Or will you do something else?

Here is the powers that you can use:
Hypnosis
possession
Slime
teleport
Revival

Rules:
No Gay stuff.....though lesbian is allowed.
You can ONLY possess females. Males can be used to interact but no possessing them.
Do not use ending chapters, keep the story going.
Keep it 18+. no 13+
The chapters need to have at least a paragraph.
